tv.matchstick.fling

Class FlingMediaControlIntent

  • java.lang.Object
    • tv.matchstick.fling.FlingMediaControlIntent

  • public class FlingMediaControlIntent
extends java.lang.Object
    Fling media control intent. Intent constants for use with the Fling MediaRouteProvider.
    This class also contains utility methods for creating a control category for discovering Fling media routes that support a specific app and/or set of namespaces, to be used with MediaRouteSelector.

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_FLING_RELAUNCH_APPLICATION
        Extra data for relaunch application. The extra that indicates whether the application should be relaunched if it is already running (the default behavior) or whether an attempt should be made to join the application first.

        Returns:

        public static java.lang.String categoryForFling(java.lang.String applicationId)
                                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Get fling category with application Id. Returns a custom control category for discovering Fling devices that support running the specified app, independent of whether the app is running or not.

        fling category

        public static java.lang.String categoryForFling(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> namespaces)
                                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Get fling category with specific namespace. Returns a custom control category for discovering Fling devices currently running an application which supports the specified namespaces.

      • categoryForFling

        public static java.lang.String categoryForFling(java.lang.String applicationId,
                                                java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> namespaces)
        Get Fling category with specific application and it's namespace list. Returns a custom control category for discovering Fling devices meeting both application ID and namespace restrictions.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - application Id
        namespaces - namespace list
        Returns:
        fling category
